section.title: C:/Users/mathh/GitHub/Molecular-Spintronics-Research-Project/MSD Research Project - Latest Development Version/src Directory Reference

indexterm.primary: C:/Users/mathh/GitHub/Molecular-Spintronics-Research-Project/MSD Research Project - Latest Development Version/src Directory Reference

listitem.para: Contains functions for reading and parsing MMT (MSD Molecule Text) files, such as those created by the MSD Molecule Builder webtool.
The extern "C" version of MSD. May not contain the full functionality of MSD.h. To be used for Python3 (ctypes) binding, as well as any future bindings that require a C (cdecl) DLL.
The core logic which all the apps use to run MSD simulations. Includes definitions and calculations.
